Class GsonMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest.impl.GsonMessageConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageConverter

    public class GsonMessageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageConverter

    Implementation of MessageConverter which relies on Gson to perform object conversions.
